document_data.caption: Various bottles and flasks filled with potions.
document_data.name: Potion
document_data.mainbody:
Type
!
Effect
!
Duration
!
Base cost
|- |[[A Mother's Loathing]]||Drink||Granted the bite of a [[Vampire spawn]]||Until next long rest||1gp |- |[[Potion of absorption|Absorption]]||Drink||Damage protection||6 minutes||1,200gp |- |[[Oil of animate dead|Animate Dead]]||Oil||[[Animate dead]]||Instant||1,500gp |- |[[Antidote]]||Drink||Cured poison||Instant||Varied |- |[[Potion of barkskin|Barkskin]]||Drink||''[[Barkskin]]''||1 hour||? |- |[[Blood of Tyche]]{{Cite dragon/388/Channel Divinity: Tymora|47}}||Drink||Luck in exchange for weaker healing||?||1,000gp |- |[[Braehg]]||Drink||Cured poison and gave strength and energy||Instant||3 hours||? |- |[[Broken Promises]]||Drink||Boost of strength, followed by strength loss||Indefinite||1gp |- |[[Butterflies in the Stomach]]||Drink||Internal haemorrhaging||Instant||1gp |- |[[Chaos Curse]]||Fume source||Suppressed impulse control if inhaled, inflicted [[Vampire|vampirism]] if drunk||While exposed||? |- |[[Potion of clarity|Clarity]]||Drink||''[[Clarity of mind]]''||1 hour||1,050gp |- |[[Potion of diminution|Diminution]]||Drink||Shrunk user||4 hours||500gp |- |[[Potion of explosions|Explosions]]{{Cite dragon/91/Treasure Trove|53}}||Bomb||Exploded||Instant||150gp |- |[[Potion of fortitude|Fortitude]]||Drink||Increased constitution||2.5 hours||500gp |- |[[Potion of giant strength|Giant (type) strength]]||Drink||Granted strength of a specific giant||1 hour||Varies |- |[[Potion of healing|Healing]]||Drink||Healed||Instant||50gp |- |[[Potion of infertility|Infertility]]||Drink||Caused infertility||1 month||150gp |- |[[Insanity's Kiss]]||Drink||Immediate murderous frenzy, hostile to anyone nearby ||?||1gp |- |[[Potion of jump|Jump]]||Drink||''[[Jump]]''||1 minute||? |- |[[Keoghtom's ointment]]||Salve||Cure-all||Instant||13,000gp |- |[[Lover's Avarice]]||Drink||Weakened will/reduced insightful||Several minutes||1gp |- |[[Moonfire salve]]||Salve||Various|| Various||2,500gp |- |[[Mummy's tea]]||Drink||Cured disease/blindness/deafness||Instant||? |- |[[Oil of slipperiness|Slipperiness]]||Oil||''[[Freedom of movement]]'' or ''[[grease]]''||8 hours||1,000gp |- |[[Philter of glibness]]||Drink||Granted fluent speech and convincing lies||?||2,500gp |- |[[Relona's anti-pudding dissolving agent]]||Bomb||Weakened [[black pudding]]s||Instant||? |- |[[Spellslayer wine]]{{Cite dungeon/195/Eye on the Realms: Spellslayer Wine}}||Drink||Disabled arcane casting||8 hours||? |- |[[Thrym extract]]||Oil||Protected against cold||Instant||? |- |[[Vial of revenge]]||Drink||Unleashed curse on user's death||Instant||? |- |[[Waters of devotion]]||Drink||Caused devotion to another||1 month|? |- |[[Wilted Dreams]]||Drink||Psyche assaulted while sleeping|| 1 sleep || 1gp |}
